preqs: Any of DWG1102, DWG1202, DWG1301, DWG1401, DWG1201, DWG1103, or permission from Studio Coordinator.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG1102, DWG1103, DWG1201, DWG1202, DWG1301, DWG1401}

description: An intense investigation of the skills required for drawing the human body. Studio classes using life models develop skills in observing inner structure, gesture, spatial organisation and characterisation. Technical studies of representational devices, mark selection, emphasis, and lighting promote a broader understanding of the use of the body's representation in contemporary practice.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
